H0.text: What singer is by far the most famous person from the island nation of Barbados. Shontelle

H1.text: What singer is by far the most famous person from the island nation of Barbados. Rupee

H2.text: What singer is by far the most famous person from the island nation of Barbados. Alison Hinds

H3.text: What singer is by far the most famous person from the island nation of Barbados. RiRi

A4.text: Rihanna was named an ambassador by the Government of Barbados in 2018 and declared a National Hero of Barbados in 2021.

A5.text: Rihanna is the first female musician to achieve billionaire status and founded the Clara Lionel Foundation, Fenty Beauty, and the fashion brand Fenty under LVMH.
